{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Social Media Video Influencer (TikTok, Instagram & Live)",
  "description": "Quick Collect is a leading money transfer company headquartered in Canada. We make it easy and secure for people to send and receive money &mdash; instantly &mdash; in Canada, Nigeria, Kenya, South Africa, and many other African countries. Whether supporting loved ones or growing businesses, Quick Collect is a trusted partner for fast, reliable cross-border payments.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Video Influencer (TikTok, Instagram &amp; Live)
Job Location:&nbsp;Remote (Canada-based company)
Employment Type: Full-time&nbsp;(Contract or Employee)

Role Overview


	We&rsquo;re looking for a confident, creative professional to become the face of Quick Collect across TikTok, Instagram, and live video events.
	As our Social Media Video Influencer, you&rsquo;ll represent Quick Collect on TikTok, Instagram, and live broadcasts.
	You&rsquo;ll create engaging short-form videos, host live sessions with audiences in Canada, Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya, and beyond, and showcase our brand with energy and professionalism.
	You&rsquo;ll also host fun TikTok giveaway shows designed to attract and engage large audiences while building excitement for our services. We&rsquo;ll provide branded shirts, caps, and everything you need to present yourself as the official face of Quick Collect.


What You&rsquo;ll Do


	Plan, produce, and post high-energy TikTok and Instagram Reels about Quick Collect&rsquo;s services.
	Host live sessions and giveaway shows on TikTok to attract and engage crowds, promoting our brand.
	Be a clear, confident, and approachable presence on camera.
	Collaborate with our marketing team to develop campaign strategies and video ideas.
	Monitor social media trends and integrate them into content to maximize engagement.
	Share insights from analytics and suggest ways to grow our audience.


What We&rsquo;re Looking For


	Fluent English speaker with clear, articulate communication skills.
	Outgoing, intellectual, and engaging personality &mdash; no camera shyness.
	Proven experience creating TikTok, Instagram Reels, or hosting live video events.
	Good lighting and professional equipment suitable for TikTok/Instagram creators.
	Ability to work across different time zones (Canada, Africa).
	Strong storytelling, conversation, and presentation skills.
	Portfolio or examples of previous TikTok, Instagram, or live video work.


Benefits


	Base pay: N120,000 per month (with a salary review and potential increase after a 2-month probationary period).
	Medical allowance: up to N100,000.
	December festival bonus: N100,000.
	Data expenses fully covered by Quick Collect.
	Branded clothing and accessories provided (shirts, face caps, etc.).
	Be the official face of a trusted international money transfer brand.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their R&eacute;sum&eacute; or LinkedIn profile, links to TikTok/Instagram/live content you&rsquo;ve created, and a short note explaining why you&rsquo;d be an amazing face of Quick Collect to:&nbsp;hr@quickcollects.com&nbsp;using &quot;Social Media Video Influencer &ndash; Quick&quot; as the subject of the email.",

Social Media Video Influencer (TikTok, Instagram & Live) Job at Quick Collect




        
    

        
        Quick Collect is a leading money transfer company headquartered in Canada. We make it easy and secure for people to send and receive money — instantly — in Canada, Nigeria, Kenya, South Africa, and many other African countries. Whether supporting loved ones or growing businesses, Quick Collect is a trusted partner for fast, reliable cross-border payments.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Video Influencer (TikTok, Instagram & Live)
Job Location: Remote (Canada-based company)
Employment Type: Full-time (Contract or Employee)

Role Overview
     

            
    




	We’re looking for a confident, creative professional to become the face of Quick Collect across TikTok, Instagram, and live video events.
	As our Social Media Video Influencer, you’ll represent Quick Collect on TikTok, Instagram, and live broadcasts.
	You’ll create engaging short-form videos, host live sessions with audiences in Canada, Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya, and beyond, and showcase our brand with energy and professionalism.
	You’ll also host fun TikTok giveaway shows designed to attract and engage large audiences while building excitement for our services. We’ll provide branded shirts, caps, and everything you need to present yourself as the official face of Quick Collect.


What You’ll Do


	Plan, produce, and post high-energy TikTok and Instagram Reels about Quick Collect’s services.
	Host live sessions and giveaway shows on TikTok to attract and engage crowds, promoting our brand.
	Be a clear, confident, and approachable presence on camera.
	Collaborate with our marketing team to develop campaign strategies and video ideas.
	Monitor social media trends and integrate them into content to maximize engagement.
	Share insights from analytics and suggest ways to grow our audience.


What We’re Looking For


	Fluent English speaker with clear, articulate communication skills.
	Outgoing, intellectual, and engaging personality — no camera shyness.
	Proven experience creating TikTok, Instagram Reels, or hosting live video events.
	Good lighting and professional equipment suitable for TikTok/Instagram creators.
	Ability to work across different time zones (Canada, Africa).
	Strong storytelling, conversation, and presentation skills.
	Portfolio or examples of previous TikTok, Instagram, or live video work.


Benefits


	Base pay: N120,000 per month (with a salary review and potential increase after a 2-month probationary period).
	Medical allowance: up to N100,000.
	December festival bonus: N100,000.
	Data expenses fully covered by Quick Collect.
	Branded clothing and accessories provided (shirts, face caps, etc.).
	Be the official face of a trusted international money transfer brand.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Résumé or LinkedIn profile, links to TikTok/Instagram/live content you’ve created, and a short note explaining why you’d be an amazing face of Quick Collect to: hr@quickcollects.com using "Social Media Video Influencer – Quick" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Openings at CW Real Estate
content:
CW Real Estate is a forward-thinking real estate firm redefining the property experience across Nigeria and beyond. We specialize in premium residential and commercial properties, offering tailored solutions combining innovation, expertise, and an in-depth market understanding.

Driven by a passion for excellence, we provide end-to-end services—from property acquisition and development to sales, leasing, and property management. Our experienced professionals are committed to delivering value, integrity, and results for every client.
     

            
    



At CW Real Estate, we don’t just build and sell properties—we create communities, investments, and lifestyle opportunities that stand the test of time. Whether you’re a first-time buyer, seasoned investor, or corporate partner, we’re here to help you make smart, informed real estate decisions.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Social Media Manager

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Social Media Manager to develop, implement, and manage our overall social media strategy.
	This role is pivotal in increasing brand awareness, enhancing our online reputation, generating qualified leads, and supporting our agents’ success.
	The ideal candidate is a creative storyteller, a data-driven strategist, and a real estate enthusiast who understands how to build community and drive engagement in a competitive market.


Responsibilities
Strategy & Planning:


	Develop and execute a comprehensive, data-driven social media strategy aligned with business goals (brand awareness, lead generation, talent acquisition).
	Define key performance indicators (KPIs) and present monthly reports on campaign performance, audience growth, and ROI.
	Stay ahead of the latest social media trends, tools, and algorithm changes, especially within the real estate and local business landscape.
	Manage the social media content calendar, ensuring a consistent and timely flow of content across all platforms.


Content Creation & Community Management:


	Create, curate, and publish engaging, high-quality content (photos, videos, reels, stories, carousels, blog posts) that showcases our properties, team, expertise, and community involvement.
	Produce visually stunning content, including shooting and editing short-form video (TikTok, Reels, Shorts) and photography for property highlights, agent profiles, and neighborhood guides.
	Foster a vibrant online community by actively engaging with followers, responding to comments and messages promptly, and initiating conversations.
	Manage online reviews and our reputation on platforms like Google My Business and Facebook.


Advertising & Lead Generation:


	Plan and execute paid social media advertising campaigns (Meta Ads, LinkedIn Ads, etc.) to promote listings, open houses, and brand initiatives.
	Monitor ad spend, optimize campaigns for maximum lead generation and cost-effectiveness, and report on results.
	Implement strategies to capture leads directly through social media channels and nurture them through the sales funnel.


Collaboration & Brand Alignment:


	Work closely with our real estate agents, marketing team, and leadership to source content, promote listings, and align social media efforts with company-wide campaigns.
	Ensure all content is on-brand, consistent in terms of style, quality, and tone of voice.
	Support HR in promoting the company culture and assisting with recruitment marketing to attract top talent.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, or a related field.
	Proven work experience of 3+ years as a Social Media Manager, with a portfolio showcasing successful campaigns. Experience in real estate, hospitality, or luxury retail is asignificant plus.
	Expert knowledge of all major social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok, Pinterest, YouTube) and their best practices.
	Proficiency in content creation tools (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite - Premiere Rush, Photoshop, or Canva, CapCut, InShot).
	Demonstrable experience with social media management and analytics tools (e.g., Meta Business Suite, Hootsuite, Buffer, Sprout Social, Google Analytics).
	Experience planning and managing a social media budget with proven ROI.
	Excellent writing, editing, and communication skills with a keen eye for detail.


Benefits


	A competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
	HMO, Pension.
	A dynamic and supportive work environment within a growing company.


Application Closing Date: 23rd October 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send CV and a link to your portfolio, examples of social media profiles you have managed to: careers@cwlagos.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 


2.) Photographer & Videographer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking a result driven individual that will be responsible for producing high-quality, marketable visual content that showcases our property listings in their best light.
	The ideal candidate is a creative professional with a keen eye for composition and lighting, technical proficiency in both photo and video equipment, and a deep understanding of how to create content that appeals to potential buyers and drives engagement.
	This role requires a blend of artistic talent, technical expertise, and exceptional client-facing professionalism.


Responsibilities


	Real Estate Photography:
	
		Capture high-resolution, professional-grade interior and exterior photographs of residential and commercial properties.
		Expertly utilize HDR (High Dynamic Range) and flash/ambient blending techniques to achieve perfectly exposed images in various lighting conditions.
		Stage and style rooms effectively, making subtle adjustments to enhance the property's appeal (e.g., fluffing pillows, adjusting blinds, removing minor clutter).
		Utilize wide-angle lenses appropriately to capture the full scope of a space without causing distortion.
		Conduct twilight/blue hour shoots to create dramatic exterior shots.
		Photo Editing:Efficiently edit and retouch photos using Adobe Lightroom and Photoshop, ensuring color accuracy, perspective correction, and a consistent, polished style across all images.
	
	
	Real Estate Videography:
	
		Plan, shoot, and edit compelling property tour videos, including standard tours, cinematic-style films, and hyperlapse/slider shots.
		Produce engaging video content for social media platforms (e.g., Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube Shorts), including behind-the-scenes clips, agent interviews, and neighborhood highlights.
		Operate gimbals and other stabilization equipment to ensure smooth, professional camera movement.
		Capture high-quality audio for voice-overs or agent voice-on-camera presentations.
		Video Editing: Expertly edit video footage using software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro and DaVinci Resolve. Tasks include color grading, audio mixing, adding music, graphics, and basic motion effects to create a cohesive and engaging narrative.
		Drone Footage Processing: Edit and color-grade aerial footage to seamlessly integrate with ground-level video and photos.
	
	
	Client Service & Professionalism
	
		Coordinate directly with real estate agents to schedule shoots, understand the property's unique selling points, and fulfill specific media requests.
		Maintain a professional, punctual, and respectful demeanor on-site with agents, homeowners, and tenants.
		Represent theCompany brand with the highest level of integrity and quality.
	
	


Required Qualifications & Skills


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree / HND qualification.
	Experience: 3+ years of professional experience in photography and videography, with astrong portfolio demonstrating specific experience in real estate.


Technical Proficiency:


	Mastery of DSLR or mirrorless cameras and the exposure triangle (aperture, shutter speed, ISO).
	Proficiency with Adobe Creative Suite (Lightroom, Photoshop, Premiere Pro) or equivalent editing software.
	Experience with gimbals, sliders, and other stabilization gear.


Compensation & Benefits


	Compensation: Competitive salary.
	Benefits (for Full-Time roles): HMO, Pension,company-provided technology Materials.
	Additional Perks: Opportunity for creative freedom, portfolio building with high-value properties, and potential for performance-based bonuses.


Application Closing Date: 29th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Portfolio link to: careers@cwlagos.com using "Creative Designer" as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Sales and Leasing Executive

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Are you a confident communicator and experienced closer looking for your next big opportunity? We’re expanding our Sales & Leasing team and We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven Sales & Leasing Executive to join our reputable real estate firm, you will be the driving force behind maximizing occupancy and rental income for our property portfolio,a skilled negotiator, and possesses a deep understanding of the real estate market.


Key Responsibilities
Sales & Leasing:


	Promote, market, and sell/leasing residential and commercial properties.
	Identify and qualify potential leads through networking, referrals, and market research.
	Conduct property viewings, inspections, and negotiations with prospective clients.
	Prepare and present property proposals, rental offers, and sales contracts.
	Ensure proper documentation of agreements and compliance with company policies.


Market Analysis & Strategy:


	Conduct thorough market research to stay informed about local competitors, rental rates, and market trends.
	Provide strategic recommendations on pricing, marketing strategies, and property positioning to remain competitive.
	Analyze market data to identify new opportunities for occupancy and revenue growth.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a First Degree in Estate management or related field
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in real estate sales or leasing
	Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills
	Confident, self-motivated, and target-driven personality
	Good knowledge of Lagos Island property market (Ikoyi, Lekki, VI, etc.)
	Ability to manage relationships and deliver excellent customer service


Bonus Points for:


	Existing network of buyers, renters, or property owners
	CRM or digital sales tool experience
	Real estate certifications or ongoing training


Compensation & Perks


	N150,000 Monthly Stipend
	20% Commissionon all sales and rental deals closed
	Official Carfor client meetings and property tours
	Company Phonefor seamless communication
	Amazing Work Culture— collaborative, supportive, and growth-driven
	Access to a great teamand exciting real estate listings


Application Closing Date: 30th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@cwlagos.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

4.) Cleaner / Officer Assistant

Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Department: Administration
Reports to: Admin/HR Manager

Job Purpose


	The Cleaner is responsible for ensuring the office environment is consistently clean, hygenic and well maintained.
	The role suppports the company's professional image in creating a positive workplace atmosphere by upholding high standards of cleaniness across all office areas, including workstations, meeting rooms, restrooms, and reception.


Key Responsibilites


	??????????????Clean and Sanitize office spaces, meeting rooms, restrooms and reception areas.
	Sweep, mop, dust, vacumm, and polish surfaces and fixtures regularly.
	Empty and dispose of office trash and recycling appropriately.
	Maintain cleanliness of office kitchen or break areas.
	Ensure all cleaning supplies and equipment are stored safely and used effectively.
	Adhere to health, safety, and hygiene standards at all times.


Qualifications & Skills


	Candidates should possess an SSCE / GCE / NECO with 0 - 2 years of experience.
	Previous experience as a cleaner, janitor, or in a similar role is an advantage
	Knowledge of cleaning products, techhniques, and safe handling procedures
	Reliablity, puntuality, and a professional attitudes.
	Good organizational and time-management skills.


Core Competencies:


	Professional and intergrity
	Reliability and consistency


Salary
N80,000 / Month.

Application Closing Date: 30th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@cwlagos.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

     

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Assistant Creative Media Specialist",
  "description": "Key Retail Group -From late-night supplier negotiations to overcoming Amazon compliance challenges, our journey has been nothing short of an adventure. We embrace the spirit of innovators and problem-solvers, but we also acknowledge the hard truths&mdash;supplier hiccups, shipping nightmares, and the occasional compliance curveball. Every great experiment has its failures, and we&rsquo;ve had ours. But with an unwavering commitment to learning and growth, we dust ourselves off, recalibrate, and keep pushing forward. As a brand-building powerhouse, we thrive on competency, commitment, continuous learning, and teamwork&mdash;turning roadblocks into stepping stones. If you&rsquo;ve made it this far, you probably already have an idea of what it takes to be one of us.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Creative Media Specialist

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Key Retail Group is a leading e-commerce company growing multiple brands on Amazon FBA.
	We&rsquo;re hiring a full-time Assistant Creative Media Specialist to enhance our brands with web design, graphics, photography, and videography.
	Ideal candidates excel in fast-paced environments, showcase creativity, and understand e-commerce, especially Amazon FBA.


Responsibilities:


	Web Design:
	
		Develop, maintain, and enhance brand websites, ensuring they are visually appealing, user-friendly, and optimized for performance and SEO.
		Collaborate with the Product Managers team to create landing pages, microsites, and other web assets that drive conversions and align with brand strategies.
		Regularly update website content, ensuring all product listings, promotional banners, and other digital assets are current and reflective of the brand&rsquo;s vision.
	
	
	Graphics Design:
	
		Design high-quality graphics for use across digital platforms, including Amazon product listings, social media, websites, and marketing campaigns.
		Create compelling A+ Content and Brand Content for Amazon FBA, ensuring all designs meet platform requirements and enhance the customer experience.
		Develop visual content that adheres to brand guidelines, ensuring consistency across all media.
		Develop a distinctive product packaging design that will effectively differentiate both existing and new products in the market.
	
	
	Photography:
	
		Conduct product photoshoots, capturing high-resolution images that highlight the unique features and benefits of our products.
		Edit and retouch photos to ensure they meet the highest standards of quality and are optimized for various digital platforms.
		Work closely with the Marketing team to ensure a cohesive visual narrative across both static and dynamic content.
	
	
	Videography:
	
		Produce, shoot, and edit high-quality video content, including product demonstrations, brand stories, and promotional videos for Amazon FBA and other platforms.
		Ensure all videos are optimized for different formats, including mobile and web, and meet the specific requirements of each platform.
		Collaborate with the Marketing team to develop scripts and storyboards that align with brand messaging and marketing objectives.
	
	
	Collaboration and Reporting:
	
		Work closely with the Product Manager&#39;s team, providing creative input and ensuring all visual content aligns with product strategies and marketing goals.
		Participate in daily reviews, submitting a detailed report of achievements and tasks completed, fostering a culture of accountability and continuous improvement.
		Adhere to established work processes, KPIs, and collaboration guidelines to ensure efficiency, consistency, and quality across all creative outputs.
	
	
	Continuous Improvement:
	
		Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in web design, graphic design, photography, Marketing, and videography, implementing new techniques and tools to enhance the quality of our content.
		Participate in regular training sessions and workshops to continually improve your skill set and contribute to the growth of the Creative Media Specialist team.
		Provide constructive feedback to junior team members, supporting their development and ensuring a high standard of work across the team.
	
	


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Graphic Design, Web Design, Visual Arts, or a related field.
	Minimum of 3 - 5 years of professional experience in Web Design, Graphics Design, Photography, and Videography.
	Proven experience in e-commerce, particularly with Amazon FBA, is highly desirable.
	Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator,&nbsp;Premiere Pro, After Effects) and other relevant design and editing software.
	Strong understanding of SEO, UX/UI principles, and e-commerce best practices.
	Exceptional attention to detail, with a strong portfolio showcasing a range of web design, graphic design, photography, and videography projects.
	Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, meeting tight deadlines without compromising quality.
	Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.
	Bonus points if you have knowledge of Amazon FBA operations!


What We Offer


	Competitive Compensation: A salary of N300,000 monthly with growth opportunities.
	Impactful Role: Be part of a growing company where your contributions will shape the future of our brands.
	Dynamic Work Environment: Join a supportive and innovative team that values creativity, collaboration, and personal development.


Note


	Candidates should submit their resume and cover letter detailing their experience and why their&#39;re excited to join Key Retail Group
	Attention to detail is key&mdash;make sure to include the words &quot;Key Retail Group&quot; in your cover letter to show us you&#39;re truly interested. Join us and be part of something amazing!


Our Hiring Process


	We keep things simple and transparent! The selection process has two stages:
	
		Video Assessment: A chance for us to see your skills in action&mdash;think research, communication, and task understanding.
		Final In-Person Interview: Meet the team and show us what you&rsquo;re all about!

Assistant Creative Media Specialist Job at Key Retail Group




        
    

        
        Key Retail Group -From late-night supplier negotiations to overcoming Amazon compliance challenges, our journey has been nothing short of an adventure. We embrace the spirit of innovators and problem-solvers, but we also acknowledge the hard truths—supplier hiccups, shipping nightmares, and the occasional compliance curveball. Every great experiment has its failures, and we’ve had ours. But with an unwavering commitment to learning and growth, we dust ourselves off, recalibrate, and keep pushing forward. As a brand-building powerhouse, we thrive on competency, commitment, continuous learning, and teamwork—turning roadblocks into stepping stones. If you’ve made it this far, you probably already have an idea of what it takes to be one of us.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Creative Media Specialist

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Key Retail Group is a leading e-commerce company growing multiple brands on Amazon FBA.
	We’re hiring a full-time Assistant Creative Media Specialist to enhance our brands with web design, graphics, photography, and videography.
	Ideal candidates excel in fast-paced environments, showcase creativity, and understand e-commerce, especially Amazon FBA.


Responsibilities:


	Web Design:
	
		Develop, maintain, and enhance brand websites, ensuring they are visually appealing, user-friendly, and optimized for performance and SEO.
		Collaborate with the Product Managers team to create landing pages, microsites, and other web assets that drive conversions and align with brand strategies.
		Regularly update website content, ensuring all product listings, promotional banners, and other digital assets are current and reflective of the brand’s vision.
	
	
	Graphics Design:
	
		Design high-quality graphics for use across digital platforms, including Amazon product listings, social media, websites, and marketing campaigns.
		Create compelling A+ Content and Brand Content for Amazon FBA, ensuring all designs meet platform requirements and enhance the customer experience.
		Develop visual content that adheres to brand guidelines, ensuring consistency across all media.
		Develop a distinctive product packaging design that will effectively differentiate both existing and new products in the market.
	
	
	Photography:
	
		Conduct product photoshoots, capturing high-resolution images that highlight the unique features and benefits of our products.
		Edit and retouch photos to ensure they meet the highest standards of quality and are optimized for various digital platforms.
		Work closely with the Marketing team to ensure a cohesive visual narrative across both static and dynamic content.
	
	
	Videography:
	
		Produce, shoot, and edit high-quality video content, including product demonstrations, brand stories, and promotional videos for Amazon FBA and other platforms.
		Ensure all videos are optimized for different formats, including mobile and web, and meet the specific requirements of each platform.
		Collaborate with the Marketing team to develop scripts and storyboards that align with brand messaging and marketing objectives.
	
	
	Collaboration and Reporting:
	
		Work closely with the Product Manager's team, providing creative input and ensuring all visual content aligns with product strategies and marketing goals.
		Participate in daily reviews, submitting a detailed report of achievements and tasks completed, fostering a culture of accountability and continuous improvement.
		Adhere to established work processes, KPIs, and collaboration guidelines to ensure efficiency, consistency, and quality across all creative outputs.
	
	
	Continuous Improvement:
	
		Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in web design, graphic design, photography, Marketing, and videography, implementing new techniques and tools to enhance the quality of our content.
		Participate in regular training sessions and workshops to continually improve your skill set and contribute to the growth of the Creative Media Specialist team.
		Provide constructive feedback to junior team members, supporting their development and ensuring a high standard of work across the team.
	
	


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Graphic Design, Web Design, Visual Arts, or a related field.
	Minimum of 3 - 5 years of professional experience in Web Design, Graphics Design, Photography, and Videography.
	Proven experience in e-commerce, particularly with Amazon FBA, is highly desirable.
	Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, After Effects) and other relevant design and editing software.
	Strong understanding of SEO, UX/UI principles, and e-commerce best practices.
	Exceptional attention to detail, with a strong portfolio showcasing a range of web design, graphic design, photography, and videography projects.
	Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, meeting tight deadlines without compromising quality.
	Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment.
	Bonus points if you have knowledge of Amazon FBA operations!


What We Offer


	Competitive Compensation: A salary of N300,000 monthly with growth opportunities.
	Impactful Role: Be part of a growing company where your contributions will shape the future of our brands.
	Dynamic Work Environment: Join a supportive and innovative team that values creativity, collaboration, and personal development.


Note


	Candidates should submit their resume and cover letter detailing their experience and why their're excited to join Key Retail Group
	Attention to detail is key—make sure to include the words "Key Retail Group" in your cover letter to show us you're truly interested. Join us and be part of something amazing!


Our Hiring Process


	We keep things simple and transparent! The selection process has two stages:
	
		Video Assessment: A chance for us to see your skills in action—think research, communication, and task understanding.
		Final In-Person Interview: Meet the team and show us what you’re all about!
	
	
    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "description": "Windek Group is a diversified conglomerate with subsidiaries spanning energy, construction, procurement, oil &amp; gas, and renewable energy. We are committed to innovation, excellence, and sustainable growth.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketer
Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview


	The successful candidate will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing our digital marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, generate leads, and drive business growth.


Key Responsibilities


	Collect, process, and analyze large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
	Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns across multiple platforms (social media, email, SEO, PPC, etc.).
	Manage the company&rsquo;s online presence, including websites and social media platforms.
	Create engaging and relevant content to attract and retain target audiences.
	Monitor, analyze, and report on campaign performance using digital analytics tools.
	Stay up to date with the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing.
	Collaborate with internal teams to align marketing strategies with business objectives.
	Suggest and implement growth strategies to increase brand visibility and market reach.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or related field.
	Proven experience as a Digital Marketer or in a similar role.
	Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms (Google Ads, Meta Ads, SEO tools, Google Analytics, etc.).
	Strong understanding of content marketing, social media management, and lead generation.
	Excellent communication, creativity, and project management skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Salary
N300,000&nbsp;&ndash; N400,000&nbsp;monthly gross

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to:&nbsp;recruitment.windek@gmail.com&nbsp;using&nbsp;&ldquo;Digital Marketer&rdquo; as the subject of the email.",

Digital Marketer Job at Windek Group




        
    

        
        Windek Group is a diversified conglomerate with subsidiaries spanning energy, construction, procurement, oil & gas, and renewable energy. We are committed to innovation, excellence, and sustainable growth.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketer
Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview


	The successful candidate will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing our digital marketing strategies to increase brand awareness, generate leads, and drive business growth.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Collect, process, and analyze large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
	Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns across multiple platforms (social media, email, SEO, PPC, etc.).
	Manage the company’s online presence, including websites and social media platforms.
	Create engaging and relevant content to attract and retain target audiences.
	Monitor, analyze, and report on campaign performance using digital analytics tools.
	Stay up to date with the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing.
	Collaborate with internal teams to align marketing strategies with business objectives.
	Suggest and implement growth strategies to increase brand visibility and market reach.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or related field.
	Proven experience as a Digital Marketer or in a similar role.
	Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms (Google Ads, Meta Ads, SEO tools, Google Analytics, etc.).
	Strong understanding of content marketing, social media management, and lead generation.
	Excellent communication, creativity, and project management skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Salary
N300,000 – N400,000 monthly gross

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a cover letter to: recruitment.windek@gmail.com using “Digital Marketer” as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Job Position: Maintenance Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	The team delivers a first-class reactive repairs and maintenance service.
	We ensure a customer-focused service is provided to all residents and stakeholders.
	We work closely with our contractors, and clients to provide effiecient and effective pumping machines.
	You will report to the Senior Maintenance Officer.
	You will have the support of an experienced team.

	Strict adherence to company policy and operating procedures.


Salary
N60,000 - N90,000 / Month.

Maintenance Officer Job at Jemimah Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Jemimah Nigeria Limited was incorporated in 1991 as a small company trading in household pumps, Jemimah has grown into a well organized corporate organization with fully fledged offices and showrooms in four major Nigerian cities. Jemimah is partnered with various OEM’s around the world to ensure we provide the best quality products to the Nigerian fluid sector. Jemimah Nig. Ltd is poised to be the leading provider of fluid solutions technology in Nigeria. We are inspired to achieve this through committed associations. We strive to be the most innovative ,competitive and efficient in providing a product mix of pumps, tanks, treatment solutions, etc to the Nigerian market

We are recruiting to fill the position below:
     

            
    



Job Position: Maintenance Officer

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	The team delivers a first-class reactive repairs and maintenance service.
	We ensure a customer-focused service is provided to all residents and stakeholders.
	We work closely with our contractors, and clients to provide effiecient and effective pumping machines.
	You will report to the Senior Maintenance Officer.
	You will have the support of an experienced team.
	You will have the opportunity to learn a wide range of skills.
	Whilst experience of working in the maintenance field would be advantageous, just as important are strong ICT and highly developed administrative skills.
	The ability to extract and interpret data would be helpful.
	This would be an excellent opportunity for someone who is willing to face new challenges and develop into the maintenance role.


Requirements
You Should:


	Interested candidates should possess an SSCE, OND, HND qualification with 1-4 years of experience.
	You should be an effective team player and be able to demonstrate a commitment to excellent customer service. You should be able to communicate effectively with a range of different audiences.
	You should be able to problem solve and work on your own initiative. You should have the ability to cope with changing circumstances. In this role it is imperative that you have strong administrative and ICT skills and can effectively use Microsoft Office. Finally, you should have the desire to make a difference at Jemimah Nigeria Limited.
	Strict adherence to company policy and operating procedures.


Salary
N60,000 - N90,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrjemimah1@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
